title: Summer Intern 2026- Software (Implementation of Kubernetes for AES Framework)

description.description:
Tittle:
Implementation of Kubernetes for AES Framework Infrastructure and Deployment of Offline Services.
Purpose:
 
To avoid obsolescence risks, implement the deployment on a Kubernetes cluster of Offline services using the AES Framework.
Description:
The ALMA OFFLINE applications are a central part of the data processing workflow inside the observatory, but are also very relevant for the rest of the Observatory's main processes. More than 40 applications are deployed in each release in production, and all of them are continuously tested following the software delivery process of the observatory. It's crucial for these applications to work properly once they are deployed in production. Currently, these applications are built as Docker images and deployed in a Docker Swarm cluster. There are separate Docker Swarm clusters for the different testing and production environments. Regarding production environments, there are two at JAO (one at OSF and another at SCO) and one at each of the ARCs, making a total of five production environments. One important achievement of the current implementation of the AES framework is that these five production environments, and the services that run inside them, are configured and deployed in a standardized way. This facilitates the reproducibility of any potential issue and the maintainability of all these environments. However, there are growing concerns about the future of Docker Swarm since the acquisition of Docker by a commercial company. Hence, migrating to Kubernetes is important in order to align with the current industry standards and best practices and long-term needs. It is expected that the current AES framework can be modified instead of having Docker Swarm as the final backend orchestrator, to replace/ update the corresponding portions of the framework, so that the Offline Services can be deployed on a Kubernetes cluster, and this cluster could also be automatically generated and configured as it is now. By having this new option to deploy on Kubernetes, the organization facilitates greater reliability, flexibility in multi-cloud or hybrid environments, and a future proof platform for managing ALMA Offline containerized services.
Objectives:
General Objective:
Implement the capability to provide the infrastructure and deployment of ALMA Offline services using the AES Framework into a Kubernetes cluster.
Specific Objectives:
Study the AES Framework used for deploying ALMA OFFLINE Services.
Study the AES Framework infrastructure provisioning for Docker and Docker-swarm.
Understand the current containerization and orchestration approach based on Docker and Docker Swarm.
Research Kubernetes features, tools, and best practices applicable to the AES Framework.
Implement a proof of concept (PoC) of Kubernetes deployment using the AES Framework.
Deliverables:
The expected deliverables are:
Git repository/branch (docker repo) with the necessary changes to the configuration that we already have.
Document the results of the research on how to implement and adapt the AES Framework for Kubernetes deployment.
Document the results of the research on how to implement and adapt the AES Framework for Kubernetes infrastructure provisioning.
Depending on the results of the previous investigation, a preliminary/proof-of-concept implementation of the solution.
Deadline for applications: 
Friday, October 24th, 2025 at 12 pm Chile time.
﻿

title: Summer Intern 2026- Software (Visualization and monitoring of nodes and jobs)

description.description:
Tittle:
﻿
Visualization and monitoring of nodes and jobs for software compilation processes in Jenkins.
Purpose:
Implement monitoring and visualization tools for Jenkins nodes and jobs involved in software compilation processes. These tools will provide deeper insights into build performance, resource utilization, and job execution, enabling the IRM team to improve reliability, optimize workflows, and facilitate data-driven decision-making in continuous integration environments.
Description:
The Atacama Large Millimeter/Submillimeter Array (ALMA) is one of the most advanced astronomical observatories in the world. It is located in the Atacama Desert of northern Chile. Its scientific mission depends on highly complex software systems that coordinate operations, manage large-scale data processing, and ensure the continuous delivery of reliable services to support astronomical research. Within this environment, Jenkins plays a central role in orchestrating the software compilation processes inside the Software team at JAO. These processes are critical, as they ensure that the software used across ALMA’s distributed infrastructure, from the high altitude Operations Support Facility (OSF) to the Santiago Central Office (SCO), is built, tested, and deployed consistently to support uninterrupted scientific operations. This internship will focus on implementing monitoring and visualization tools for Jenkins nodes and jobs involved in software compilation. By analyzing performance metrics, resource utilization, and job execution patterns. The student will help to create mechanisms that improve transparency and efficiency within the software build pipeline. The outcome of this work will provide better insights for software engineers in the Integration and Release Management team, helping to enable (in the future) early detection of performance bottlenecks and contribute to workflow optimization and improved reliability of ALMA’s software infrastructure.
Through this experience, the student will gain practical exposure to continuous integration environments, software quality assurance practices, and data visualization techniques applied in a large-scale scientific Observatory. The internship will also provide opportunities to collaborate with experienced engineers, understand the challenges of maintaining critical systems, and develop solutions that contribute directly to the robustness of the software processes in ALMA.
Objectives:
General Objective:
Develop monitoring and visualization capabilities for Jenkins nodes and jobs to enhance the understanding, performance, and reliability of software compilation processes.
Specific Objectives:
Study the current Jenkins-based software compilation infrastructure and identify relevant metrics for monitoring.
Integrate monitoring solutions in the Jenkins nodes to enable real-time insights.
Implement dashboards and visualization tools in Grafana to track job execution, build performance, and resource usage of the nodes.
Evaluate the effectiveness of the monitoring and visualization tools.
Deliverables:
The expected deliverables are:
Git repository/branch.
Document the results of the research.
Grafana dashboards with metrics and visualizations of the different Jenkins nodes and these particular jobs:
Integrator
ONLINE
Deploy
ART Dispatcher
Deadline for applications:
 Friday, October 24th, 2025 at 12 pm Chile time.

 Host/Hostess, (
Open through Season
)
Shift: 
Full Time/Part Time 
Location:
 Hive Bakery & Cafe, West Palm Beach, Florida
 
 
  
About Us:
 
Hive Collective is an upscale dining venue located in West Palm Beach, Florida. We are committed to providing exceptional guest experiences through our sophisticated ambiance, curated menus, and dedicated staff. We are seeking skilled and experienced Host/Hostess Leaders to oversee our front-of-house operations during breakfast/lunch and dinner shifts. 
Position Overview: 
 
The Host/Hostess is responsible for greeting guests warmly and enthusiastically, managing reservations, and ensuring a smooth flow of guests at the front of the restaurant. This role is essential in creating a welcoming atmosphere and providing an exceptional first impression of Hive Collective. As a Host/Hostess of Hive Bakery & Cafe, you create the most important critical moment of our guest’s experience.   
What Your Background / Experience Should Look Like: 
 
Minimum age as per state requirements   
High school diploma or GED preferred   
Professional attire and appearance in line with Hive Collective standards; *Note: Attire and appearance standards may vary between Breakfast/Lunch and Dinner shifts  
Warm and welcoming communication and social skills  
Knowledge of food safety and handling standards   
Ability to work closely with staff in a fast-paced environment  
Key Responsibilities: 
 
Here's the categorized list of the responsibilities and duties mentioned: 
Exceptional Guest Experience & Service:
 
Greet and acknowledge guests warmly; manage guest flow and seating 
Maintain a warm and friendly demeanor, providing an amazing first experience and WOW moment for our guests 
Create an exceptional experience at the reception desk and waiting areas 
Escort guests to tables, present menus, and provide menu tours 
Accurately quote wait times and maintain the wait list 
Communicate guest requests, complaints, and feedback to management promptly 
Reservation & Host Management:
 
Manage the reservation portal to maximize seating and reservations 
Review reservation lists and coordinate with managers for optimal guest flow 
Assign parties to appropriate sections and/or servers 
Answer phones professionally and courteously, managing reservations in OpenTable 
Maintain cleanliness and organization of the host area 
Team Coordination & Training:
 
Communicate with management regarding guest needs and concerns 
Coordinate with the team to accommodate special events and large parties 
Train and develop junior hosts, providing direction as needed 
Ensure fair and even distribution of covers among the service team 
Operational Standards & Safety:
 
Maintain operational standards as outlined in the training manual and employee handbook 
Complete opening, side, and closing duties as per standard operating procedures 
Respond quickly to spills and ensure safety in the dining room 
Stay informed about special events, menu changes, and guest requests 
Maintain situational awareness of the restaurant, including server abilities, kitchen status, and special guests 
Maintain clean, pressed uniform and professional appearance 
Competencies: 
Accuracy, Detail Orientation, Warm Communication, Exceptional Service Delivery, Collaboration, Eagerness to Learn Quickly, Organizational Skills 
Benefits For You:
Dynamic and supportive work environment that values and prioritizes God, family, and work. 
Opportunities for professional growth and development 
Engaging and collaborative company culture 
50% Hive Collective employee discount to you and immediate family members 
Paid holidays and Paid Time Off (PTO) after initial employment period for Full-Time Employees;
No work on Sundays or major holidays.

description.description:
Position: Seasonal Sales Associate - Hive Boutiques
 (Hive for Her & Hive for Him)
Reports to:
 Hive Boutiques, Store Manager 
Seasonal: October through April
Job Overview:
 
Are you passionate about fashion and creating moments for others? Join the Hive Collective family as a Seasonal Sales Associate! This exciting role offers the opportunity to be part of a dynamic and collaborative team, helping to create memorable shopping experiences during the bustling season. As a Seasonal Sales Associate, you are responsible for creating a first-rate client experience through superior sales and service at the Hive Boutiques store for Him and Her. You'll be a valued member of the Hive team, playing a key role in delighting our customers. 
You should be well-versed in our Hive Boutiques brands and passionate about helping customers find items that light up their day!
Key Responsibilities:
 
Provide a Positive Customer Experience
 
Welcome customers immediately with sincerity and enthusiasm and create a warm and welcoming experience. 
Maintain an active floor presence, demonstrating availability and openness to the customer. 
Engage customers with an intuitive approach to determine their needs. 
Provide an exceptional fitting room experience. 
Return to the fitting room often to check in on the customer and remove unwanted items. 
Provide relevant fashion advice, product knowledge, and recommendations. 
Bring additional merchandise to complete the customer's look. 
Complete the customer experience with an accurate and efficient checkout. 
Demonstrate accuracy and efficiency at the point of sale. 
Be gracious in accepting returns and turn them into a sale when possible. 
Fold, wrap, or hang the customer's purchase meeting Hive's wrapping standard. 
Send professional thank-you notes to your customers. 
Provide exceptional service to the customer through professionalism, ownership, and initiative. 
Handle requests and daily tasks courteously and productively, using appropriate language and tone of voice. 
Show your willingness to be of assistance and take initiative in finding creative solutions when faced with obstacles. 
Team Collaboration
 
Team up with other salespeople to best serve the client's needs. 
Outreach to support in-store and online sales, and invite customers to special events when appropriate. 
Show commitment to the team through collaboration and positive, proactive communication. 
Raise concerns in a timely, constructive, and appropriate manner. 
Actively listen to other points of view, and share thoughts and ideas in order to reach a common understanding. 
Resolve conflict proactively with clear and direct communication and be open to receiving constructive feedback. 
Sales and Customer Relationship Management
 
Add accurate customer information on a regular basis. 
Support driving sales and gross margin performance. 
Store Maintenance and Operations
 
Demonstrate knowledge and proficiency in all tasks and procedures to support the sales floor. 
Maintain the store when customers are not present, including receiving shipments, stocking, and maintaining displays. 
Complete projects and tasks accurately and in a timely manner. 
Follow inventory procedures. 
Seek ways to improve your own performance. 
Demonstrate productivity, using time efficiently and effectively to deliver strong results. 
Handle and follow through on all employee and customer interactions in a solution-focused and timely way. 
Approach tasks and deadlines with a sense of focus, urgency, and attention to detail. 
Deliver high-quality work, communicate ongoing progress, and show accountability. 
Prioritize tasks and projects efficiently without negatively impacting service. 
Be accountable for information covered in the Hive Code of Conduct. 
Demonstrate honest and ethical behavior. 
Work scheduled shifts, demonstrate flexibility when schedule changes are necessary and notify your manager prior to your shift if you are delayed or unable to work. 
Record all time worked promptly and accurately. 
Follow all safety guidelines. 
Safeguard sensitive, private, and confidential information. 
Personal and Professional Development
 
Maintain a well-groomed appearance and follow dress code guidelines. 
Demonstrate reliability, flexibility, and openness to change. 
Benefits For You:
 
Dynamic and supportive work environment that values and prioritizes God, family, and work. 
Opportunities for professional growth and development 
Engaging and collaborative company culture 
50% Hive Collective employee discount to you and immediate family members 
Holidays off; No work on Sundays 
Competencies:
 
Collaboration, Communication, Customer Service Skills, Sales Skills, Flexibility, Professionalism, Enthusiasm, Reliability, Learning Agility, Integrity

description.description:
CapsLock
 is a company that specializes in providing digital marketing services to businesses that are facing sales growth challenges. Our comprehensive services include sales consulting, data analytics, and various marketing solutions, all seamlessly integrated to ensure efficient and accelerated growth.
Our company was founded by industry professionals with expertise in IT, design, and data analytics. We identified a significant need for an exclusive, scalable customer acquisition solution in the market. Our vision is to provide a unique integrated solution for B2C clients that enables profitable customer acquisition, flexible scaling, and internal processes optimisation.
At CapsLock, our core values center around our people, client orientation, quality, continuous improvement, integrity, and fostering strong relationships. Our team is diverse and skilled, speaking 10+ languages, and located worldwide. We are dedicated to pioneering new and efficient marketing strategies to ensure our clients’ success.
Role Description
We are looking for an experienced and versatile HR professional to take a leading role in our growing HR team. The ideal candidate will bring not only solid experience across all areas of HR, but also strong soft skills, structured yet creative thinking, and the ability to drive new initiatives that strengthen our culture and employee experience.
As an 
HR Team Lead
, you will manage a team of three members and report directly to the HR Director. In this role, you will act as a coach and mentor to your team, collaborate closely with other team leads, and serve as a “barometer” of what is happening within the organization. You will help to shape and evolve HR processes, from onboarding and performance evaluation tools to reporting, values, and culture programs.
We are looking for someone who can thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, who is flexible, open-minded, and comfortable working across cultural contexts. This role requires excellent communication skills, stakeholder management, and the charisma to build trust and engagement across the company.
description.requirements:
Oversee the onboarding process and manage relevant documentation (onboarding emails, templates, instructions, tasks descriptions, contracts and other communications with candidates)
Administer pulse surveys to gather feedback from employees and assess organisational culture and engagement
Collaborate with external vendors and subject matter experts to leverage industry expertise and resources for HR best practices
Oversee the planning and coordination of the major company events, including sourcing and negotiating contracts with vendors, travel arrangements, budgeting, event communications, among others
Utilize metrics and data analytics to measure the effectiveness and impact of various HR initiatives, making data-driven decisions for continuous improvement
Conduct benchmarking studies, prepare benchmarking reports and presentations for different levels of organization to support decision making and strategic planning, including preparation and submission of confidential data to survey companies (ex, Mercer survey submission)
Establish and maintain the accuracy and relevance of HR processes to ensure compliance with company policies and best practices
Develop, document, and maintain standard operating procedures (SOPs) for key HR processes
Foster a culture of continuous improvement within the HR department, encouraging feedback and innovation to drive ongoing enhancements to processes and practices
Manage employee relations by serving as a point of contact for employee inquiries and concerns
Assist HRD in establishing and implementing performance management processes, including goal setting, performance evaluations, and feedback sessions.

CapsLock
 is a company that specializes in providing digital marketing services to businesses that are facing sales growth challenges. Our comprehensive services include sales consulting, data analytics, and various marketing solutions, all seamlessly integrated to ensure efficient and accelerated growth.
Our company was founded by industry professionals with expertise in IT, design, and data analytics. We identified a significant need for an exclusive, scalable customer acquisition solution in the market. Our vision is to provide a unique integrated solution for B2C clients that enables profitable customer acquisition, flexible scaling, and internal processes optimisation.
At CapsLock, our core values center around our people, client orientation, quality, continuous improvement, integrity, and fostering strong relationships. Our team is diverse and skilled, speaking 10+ languages, and located worldwide. We are dedicated to pioneering new and efficient marketing strategies to ensure our clients’ success.
Role Description
We are looking for an experienced and versatile HR professional to take a leading role in our growing HR team. The ideal candidate will bring not only solid experience across all areas of HR, but also strong soft skills, structured yet creative thinking, and the ability to drive new initiatives that strengthen our culture and employee experience.
As an 
HR Team Lead
, you will manage a team of three members and report directly to the HR Director. In this role, you will act as a coach and mentor to your team, collaborate closely with other team leads, and serve as a “barometer” of what is happening within the organization. You will help to shape and evolve HR processes, from onboarding and performance evaluation tools to reporting, values, and culture programs.
We are looking for someone who can thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, who is flexible, open-minded, and comfortable working across cultural contexts. This role requires excellent communication skills, stakeholder management, and the charisma to build trust and engagement across the company.
description.requirements:
Oversee the onboarding process and manage relevant documentation (onboarding emails, templates, instructions, tasks descriptions, contracts and other communications with candidates)
Administer pulse surveys to gather feedback from employees and assess organisational culture and engagement
Collaborate with external vendors and subject matter experts to leverage industry expertise and resources for HR best practices
Oversee the planning and coordination of the major company events, including sourcing and negotiating contracts with vendors, travel arrangements, budgeting, event communications, among others
Utilize metrics and data analytics to measure the effectiveness and impact of various HR initiatives, making data-driven decisions for continuous improvement
Conduct benchmarking studies, prepare benchmarking reports and presentations for different levels of organization to support decision making and strategic planning, including preparation and submission of confidential data to survey companies (ex, Mercer survey submission)
Establish and maintain the accuracy and relevance of HR processes to ensure compliance with company policies and best practices
Develop, document, and maintain standard operating procedures (SOPs) for key HR processes
Foster a culture of continuous improvement within the HR department, encouraging feedback and innovation to drive ongoing enhancements to processes and practices
Manage employee relations by serving as a point of contact for employee inquiries and concerns
Assist HRD in establishing and implementing performance management processes, including goal setting, performance evaluations, and feedback sessions.
Oversee HRIS and data management to ensure accurate and up-to-date employee records
Skills and Experience:
Proven experience as an HR Manager or similar role, with a minimum of 3 years of experience.
Knowledge of HR best practices
Experience in project management and budgeting
Excellent communication and negotiation skills, business acumen
Ability and willingness to build rapport with employees and vendors
Analytical skills to measure the impact and effectiveness of programs
Fluency in English
﻿Education:
Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field
Personal Characteristics:
Effective communicator
Flexible and accepting of continuous change
Comfortable in a multi-language, multi-cultural environment
Strong interest in continuous learning
Focus on data-driven decision making
Why do we deserve your attention?
Not only do we offer fair and competitive pay, but we also provide perks and benefits that support your well-being and growth. Here are some of them:
Remote Work - 
we are a truly remote-first company. You choose where you feel the most productive and comfortable to make an impact.
Paid Time Off - 
work-life balance matters to us, and we support it with paid time off for rest, personal time, or simply doing what makes you happy.
Ongoing Learning - 
we believe in curiosity and growth. That’s why we support continuous learning with workshops, online courses, conferences, and certifications.
Home Office - 
we help you set up your perfect workspace by covering equipment and furniture expenses, so you can do your best work from home.
Physical Well-Being - 
from gym memberships and yoga classes to home workout equipment or even a bicycle, we give you the flexibility to stay active your way.
Unlimited Sick Days - 
your health matters. Take the time you need to rest and recover - we’ll be here when you’re ready to return.
Medical Coverage - 
we support you and your family with reimbursement for medical insurance and health-related expenses, including dental care and psychological support.
Co-Working Space - 
if you sometimes crave a change of scenery or more social interaction, we’ll cover the full cost of a co-working space.
Fun Stuff - 
from gaming nights and fitness challenges to annual retreats at world-class resorts, we make sure there’s never a shortage of fun and connection.

description.description:
About us
We are a performance marketing agency managing over $120M in annual media spend, focused on driving measurable results for U.S.-based companies in the home improvement industry. Our 
Ad Tech department
 plays a critical role in ensuring accurate tracking, reporting, and data integrity across all campaigns, empowering our media buying teams to make data-driven decisions with confidence.
We are seeking a skilled 
Marketing Analytics Manager
 with strong technical expertise in Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, and Looker Studio, as well as proven experience in implementing, maintaining, and optimizing conversion tracking systems across multiple advertising platforms.
Key Responsibilities
Tracking & Analytics Management
Manage accounts and containers in Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4).
Deploy, configure, and maintain tags, triggers, variables, and settings across multiple websites.
Troubleshoot and resolve tracking and analytics issues to ensure accurate data collection.
Maintain and optimize reporting dashboards in GA4 and Looker Studio for actionable insights.
Conversion Tracking & Ad Platform Integration
Set up and manage conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Monitor and troubleshoot discrepancies between platform data and analytics tools.
Collaborate with media buyers to ensure accurate and reliable tracking for all campaigns.
Data Analysis & Optimization
Collect, analyze, and monitor performance data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign targeting and measurement accuracy.
Continuously refine and optimize tracking setups for better performance attribution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Development
Work closely with developers to define tracking metrics for new and existing web properties.
Identify inefficiencies in tracking workflows and propose process improvements.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends in digital measurement, attribution, and analytics.
AI Integration & Workflow Enhancement
Propose and implement AI solutions that enhance data validation, error detection, and reporting workflows.
Share insights and recommendations on new AI tools that could benefit the Ad Tech department and media buying teams.
description.requirements:
Attributes we’re looking for:
Highly detail-oriented, with a strong sense of accountability.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication skills and proactive collaboration with cross-functional teams.
Adaptable and resourceful in a fast-changing environment.
Process-oriented, with the ability to document and standardize workflows.
Eager to stay ahead of industry trends in analytics, attribution, and ad tech.
Comfortable using AI to enhance productivity, reduce manual effort, and improve decision-making.
Curious and proactive in experimenting with AI-based solutions for analytics and tracking workflows.
Requirements
Proven expertise in Google Tag Manager (GTM), Google Analytics 4 (GA4), and Looker Studio.
Hands-on experience with conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills for analytics and tracking issues.
Familiarity with media buying workflows and performance KPIs.
Solid understanding of attribution models and data accuracy best practices.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a remote environment.
Strong analytical skills and a data-driven mindset.
Inquisitive and proactive you don’t wait for direction; you look for the “why” and bring solutions
Strong organizational habits and ability to switch context between quick-turn tasks and longer-term projects
Comfortable in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment. You’re resilient, flexible, and quick to adapt when priorities shift or projects evolve
Creative and can think outside the box for tooling or process solutions to improve workflows.
Demonstrated experience using AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, automation scripts, AI reporting assistants) to improve workflows or performance.
Ability to evaluate and adopt new AI tools to enhance tracking, reporting, or collaboration processes.
Excellent writing and communication skills in English
Why do we deserve your attention?
Not only do we offer fair and competitive pay, but we also provide perks and benefits that support your well-being and growth. Here are some of them:
Remote Work
We are a truly remote-first company. You choose where you feel the most productive and comfortable to make an impact.

description.description:
About us
We are a performance marketing agency managing over $120M in annual media spend, focused on driving measurable results for U.S.-based companies in the home improvement industry. Our 
Ad Tech department
 plays a critical role in ensuring accurate tracking, reporting, and data integrity across all campaigns, empowering our media buying teams to make data-driven decisions with confidence.
We are seeking a skilled 
Marketing Analytics Manager
 with strong technical expertise in Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, and Looker Studio, as well as proven experience in implementing, maintaining, and optimizing conversion tracking systems across multiple advertising platforms.
Key Responsibilities
Tracking & Analytics Management
Manage accounts and containers in Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4).
Deploy, configure, and maintain tags, triggers, variables, and settings across multiple websites.
Troubleshoot and resolve tracking and analytics issues to ensure accurate data collection.
Maintain and optimize reporting dashboards in GA4 and Looker Studio for actionable insights.
Conversion Tracking & Ad Platform Integration
Set up and manage conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Monitor and troubleshoot discrepancies between platform data and analytics tools.
Collaborate with media buyers to ensure accurate and reliable tracking for all campaigns.
Data Analysis & Optimization
Collect, analyze, and monitor performance data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign targeting and measurement accuracy.
Continuously refine and optimize tracking setups for better performance attribution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Development
Work closely with developers to define tracking metrics for new and existing web properties.
Identify inefficiencies in tracking workflows and propose process improvements.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends in digital measurement, attribution, and analytics.
AI Integration & Workflow Enhancement
Propose and implement AI solutions that enhance data validation, error detection, and reporting workflows.
Share insights and recommendations on new AI tools that could benefit the Ad Tech department and media buying teams.

Inquisitive and proactive you don’t wait for direction; you look for the “why” and bring solutions

Demonstrated experience using AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, automation scripts, AI reporting assistants) to improve workflows or performance.

Monitor and troubleshoot discrepancies between platform data and analytics tools.
Collaborate with media buyers to ensure accurate and reliable tracking for all campaigns.
Data Analysis & Optimization
Collect, analyze, and monitor performance data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign targeting and measurement accuracy.
Continuously refine and optimize tracking setups for better performance attribution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Development
Work closely with developers to define tracking metrics for new and existing web properties.
Identify inefficiencies in tracking workflows and propose process improvements.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends in digital measurement, attribution, and analytics.
AI Integration & Workflow Enhancement
Propose and implement AI solutions that enhance data validation, error detection, and reporting workflows.
Share insights and recommendations on new AI tools that could benefit the Ad Tech department and media buying teams.

Remote Work

description.description:
About us

Ad Tech department
 plays a critical role in ensuring accurate tracking, reporting, and data integrity across all campaigns, empowering our media buying teams to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

Marketing Analytics Manager
 with strong technical expertise in Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, and Looker Studio, as well as proven experience in implementing, maintaining, and optimizing conversion tracking systems across multiple advertising platforms.
Key Responsibilities
Tracking & Analytics Management
Manage accounts and containers in Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4).
Deploy, configure, and maintain tags, triggers, variables, and settings across multiple websites.
Troubleshoot and resolve tracking and analytics issues to ensure accurate data collection.
Maintain and optimize reporting dashboards in GA4 and Looker Studio for actionable insights.
Conversion Tracking & Ad Platform Integration
Set up and manage conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Monitor and troubleshoot discrepancies between platform data and analytics tools.
Collaborate with media buyers to ensure accurate and reliable tracking for all campaigns.
Data Analysis & Optimization
Collect, analyze, and monitor performance data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign targeting and measurement accuracy.
Continuously refine and optimize tracking setups for better performance attribution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Development
Work closely with developers to define tracking metrics for new and existing web properties.
Identify inefficiencies in tracking workflows and propose process improvements.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends in digital measurement, attribution, and analytics.
AI Integration & Workflow Enhancement
Propose and implement AI solutions that enhance data validation, error detection, and reporting workflows.
Share insights and recommendations on new AI tools that could benefit the Ad Tech department and media buying teams.

We help you set up your perfect workspace by covering equipment and furniture expenses, so you can do your best work from home.
Physical Well-Being
From gym memberships and yoga classes to home workout equipment or even a bicycle, we give you the flexibility to stay active your way.
Unlimited Sick Days
Your health matters. Take the time you need to rest and recover - we’ll be here when you’re ready to return.
Medical Coverage
We support you and your family with reimbursement for medical insurance and health-related expenses, including dental care and psychological support.
Co-Working Space
If you sometimes crave a change of scenery or more social interaction, we’ll cover the full cost of a co-working space.
Fun Stuff
From gaming nights and fitness challenges to annual retreats at world-class resorts, we make sure there’s never a shortage of fun and connection.

description.description:
About us
We are a performance marketing agency managing over $120M in annual media spend, focused on driving measurable results for U.S.-based companies in the home improvement industry. Our 
Ad Tech department
 plays a critical role in ensuring accurate tracking, reporting, and data integrity across all campaigns, empowering our media buying teams to make data-driven decisions with confidence.
We are seeking a skilled 
Marketing Analytics Manager
 with strong technical expertise in Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, and Looker Studio, as well as proven experience in implementing, maintaining, and optimizing conversion tracking systems across multiple advertising platforms.
Key Responsibilities
Tracking & Analytics Management
Manage accounts and containers in Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Google Analytics 4 (GA4).
Deploy, configure, and maintain tags, triggers, variables, and settings across multiple websites.
Troubleshoot and resolve tracking and analytics issues to ensure accurate data collection.
Maintain and optimize reporting dashboards in GA4 and Looker Studio for actionable insights.
Conversion Tracking & Ad Platform Integration
Set up and manage conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Monitor and troubleshoot discrepancies between platform data and analytics tools.
Collaborate with media buyers to ensure accurate and reliable tracking for all campaigns.
Data Analysis & Optimization
Collect, analyze, and monitor performance data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities.
Provide actionable recommendations to improve campaign targeting and measurement accuracy.
Continuously refine and optimize tracking setups for better performance attribution.
Cross-Functional Collaboration & Development
Work closely with developers to define tracking metrics for new and existing web properties.
Identify inefficiencies in tracking workflows and propose process improvements.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends in digital measurement, attribution, and analytics.
AI Integration & Workflow Enhancement
Propose and implement AI solutions that enhance data validation, error detection, and reporting workflows.
Share insights and recommendations on new AI tools that could benefit the Ad Tech department and media buying teams.
description.requirements:
Attributes we’re looking for:
Highly detail-oriented, with a strong sense of accountability.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong communication skills and proactive collaboration with cross-functional teams.
Adaptable and resourceful in a fast-changing environment.
Process-oriented, with the ability to document and standardize workflows.
Eager to stay ahead of industry trends in analytics, attribution, and ad tech.
Comfortable using AI to enhance productivity, reduce manual effort, and improve decision-making.
Curious and proactive in experimenting with AI-based solutions for analytics and tracking workflows.
Requirements
Proven expertise in Google Tag Manager (GTM), Google Analytics 4 (GA4), and Looker Studio.
Hands-on experience with conversion tracking across multiple advertising platforms (Facebook, Google, Nextdoor, Newsbreak, MediaGo, Taboola, Outbrain).
Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills for analytics and tracking issues.
Familiarity with media buying workflows and performance KPIs.
Solid understanding of attribution models and data accuracy best practices.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a remote environment.
Strong analytical skills and a data-driven mindset.
Inquisitive and proactive you don’t wait for direction; you look for the “why” and bring solutions
Strong organizational habits and ability to switch context between quick-turn tasks and longer-term projects
Comfortable in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment. You’re resilient, flexible, and quick to adapt when priorities shift or projects evolve
Creative and can think outside the box for tooling or process solutions to improve workflows.
Demonstrated experience using AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, automation scripts, AI reporting assistants) to improve workflows or performance.
Ability to evaluate and adopt new AI tools to enhance tracking, reporting, or collaboration processes.
Excellent writing and communication skills in English
Why do we deserve your attention?
Not only do we offer fair and competitive pay, but we also provide perks and benefits that support your well-being and growth. Here are some of them:
Remote Work
We are a truly remote-first company. You choose where you feel the most productive and comfortable to make an impact.
Paid Time Off
Work-life balance matters to us, and we support it with paid time off for rest, personal time, or simply doing what makes you happy.
Ongoing Learning
We believe in curiosity and growth. That’s why we support continuous learning with workshops, online courses, conferences, and certifications.
Home Office
We help you set up your perfect workspace by covering equipment and furniture expenses, so you can do your best work from home.
Physical Well-Being
From gym memberships and yoga classes to home workout equipment or even a bicycle, we give you the flexibility to stay active your way.
Unlimited Sick Days
Your health matters. Take the time you need to rest and recover - we’ll be here when you’re ready to return.
Medical Coverage
We support you and your family with reimbursement for medical insurance and health-related expenses, including dental care and psychological support.
Co-Working Space
If you sometimes crave a change of scenery or more social interaction, we’ll cover the full cost of a co-working space.
Fun Stuff
From gaming nights and fitness challenges to annual retreats at world-class resorts, we make sure there’s never a shortage of fun and connection.

description.description:
Do you have Taboola and Outbrain Experience?
Have you managed ad budgets over $20,000/Month?
Do you absolutely love digging into the data and problem-solving your way into ROI-positive campaigns? 
Would you like to be a part of an energetic and dedicated team of result-oriented direct-response advertisers with 10+ years of experience?
Then read on!
CapsLock is expanding rapidly and we are looking for the right person to join our growing team.
CapsLock
 is a dynamic, global IT marketing company that pioneers unique, scalable customer acquisition solutions for B2C clients. We combine deep expertise in IT, design, and data analytics, enabling us to tackle the most complex sales challenges across a wide range of industries—primarily for large North American partners. By seamlessly integrating digital marketing services, AI-based predictive analytics and IT solutions, and sales consulting, we deliver powerful, data-informed customer acquisition solutions.
At CapsLock, people, technology, and forward-thinking innovation lie at the heart of everything we do. Our core values—client orientation, power of people, continuous improvement, and strong relationships—guide our approach to building and refining our exclusive marketing platform, offering clients profitable acquisition models, flexible scaling, and optimized internal processes. Our diverse, global team, fluent in over 10 languages, thrives on open collaboration and the exchange of new ideas, pushing boundaries to ensure our clients’ success. 
Role overview:
The Media Buyer (Native Ads) is responsible for negotiating and buying advertising inventory.
They thrive in building, maintaining, and optimizing digital advertising campaigns and has an experimental and methodological approach. The position requires a blend of creativity, analytical skill, perseverance, and results-oriented problem-solving.
Job Responsibilities:
Develop, deploy, and optimize paid media campaigns across multiple digital platforms with high conversion rates and maximized profitability.
Manage budget allocations and bid parameters to deliver the most efficient results.
Active (daily) awareness of campaign performance.
Test new ideas based on insights gained from campaign management.
Proactively and effectively optimize media buys utilizing KPIs.
Ensure that campaign KPIs and objectives are met both near and long term.
description.requirements:
4+ years’ experience in digital-performance marketing with focus on media buying.
2+ years of Taboola and Outbrain advertising experience.
Yahoo Gemini (Verizon Media Native) experience is a big plus
Advanced knowledge of Google Analytics.
Proven track record handling high campaign volume, large budgets, complex targeting strategies, and driving results
Solid analytical skills and ability to make decisions based on data - A MUST!
Organizational and multitasking abilities.
High-level Excel/Google Sheets proficiency.
Knowledge of basic statistics.
Good eye for design and creative assets

By seamlessly integrating digital marketing services, AI-based predictive analytics and IT solutions, and sales consulting, we deliver powerful, data-informed customer acquisition solutions.
At CapsLock, people, technology, and forward-thinking innovation lie at the heart of everything we do. Our core values—client orientation, power of people, continuous improvement, and strong relationships—guide our approach to building and refining our exclusive marketing platform, offering clients profitable acquisition models, flexible scaling, and optimized internal processes. Our diverse, global team, fluent in over 10 languages, thrives on open collaboration and the exchange of new ideas, pushing boundaries to ensure our clients’ success. 
Role overview:
The Media Buyer (Native Ads) is responsible for negotiating and buying advertising inventory.
They thrive in building, maintaining, and optimizing digital advertising campaigns and has an experimental and methodological approach. The position requires a blend of creativity, analytical skill, perseverance, and results-oriented problem-solving.
Job Responsibilities:
Develop, deploy, and optimize paid media campaigns across multiple digital platforms with high conversion rates and maximized profitability.
Manage budget allocations and bid parameters to deliver the most efficient results.
Active (daily) awareness of campaign performance.
Test new ideas based on insights gained from campaign management.
Proactively and effectively optimize media buys utilizing KPIs.
Ensure that campaign KPIs and objectives are met both near and long term.
description.requirements:
4+ years’ experience in digital-performance marketing with focus on media buying.

Advanced knowledge of Google Analytics.
Proven track record handling high campaign volume, large budgets, complex targeting strategies, and driving results
Solid analytical skills and ability to make decisions based on data - A MUST!
Organizational and multitasking abilities.
High-level Excel/Google Sheets proficiency.
Knowledge of basic statistics.
Good eye for design and creative assets

Requirements
 
5+ years of experience in QA, including 3+ years in test automation.
Expert-level experience with Playwright: building, maintaining, and optimizing automated tests. 
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and JavaScript for Playwright automation.
Hands-on experience automating UI, functional, and cross-browser testing scenarios. 
Experience testing responsive and adaptive layouts with pixel-perfect validation. 
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines (Bitbucket Pipelines or similar). 
Experience working on dynamic, fast-changing projects and adapting tests accordingly. 
Familiarity with code review practices and contributing to architectural decisions for test frameworks. 
Experience with AI-powered tools to support test automation by generating and optimizing tests, creating test data, and improving testing speed and efficiency. 
Basic understanding of API testing and integration scenarios. 
English level B2+
Nice to Have
Experience working with Allure dashboards or other test reporting tools.
Experience with Selenium as a complementary automation tool is a plus. 
Experience with Qase or other test management systems. 
Knowledge of optimizing test suites and reducing flaky test cases. 
Experience setting up parallel test execution in CI environments.
Why do we deserve your attention?
Not only do we offer fair and competitive pay, but we also provide perks and benefits that support your well-being and growth. Here are some of them:
Remote Work - 
we are a truly remote-first company. You choose where you feel the most productive and comfortable to make an impact.
Paid Time Off - 
work-life balance matters to us, and we support it with paid time off for rest, personal time, or simply doing what makes you happy.
Ongoing Learning - 
we believe in curiosity and growth. That’s why we support continuous learning with workshops, online courses, conferences, and certifications.
Home Office - 
we help you set up your perfect workspace by covering equipment and furniture expenses, so you can do your best work from home.
Physical Well-Being - 
from gym memberships and yoga classes to home workout equipment or even a bicycle, we give you the flexibility to stay active your way.
Unlimited Sick Days - 
your health matters. Take the time you need to rest and recover - we’ll be here when you’re ready to return.
Medical Coverage - 
we support you and your family with reimbursement for medical insurance and health-related expenses, including dental care and psychological support.
Co-Working Space - 
if you sometimes crave a change of scenery or more social interaction, we’ll cover the full cost of a co-working space.
Fun Stuff - 
from gaming nights and fitness challenges to annual retreats at world-class resorts, we make sure there’s never a shortage of fun and connection.

description.description:
About us
We are a performance marketing agency managing over $120M in annual media spend focused on
 lead generation
 for U.S.-based companies operating in the home improvement industry.
We are seeking a skilled Senior Performance Marketing Specialist with 5 years of deep experience, including 
programmatic, native, video, and social ad platforms.
Key Responsibilities
Client Launching & New Niche Testing:
 
Launch new clients and test new niches in lead generation across Facebook, Google, and other ad networks. 
Strategically plan, execute, and optimize campaigns for new clients
Ensure structured testing, performance measurement, and data-driven decision-making.
Identify and implement best practices for scaling successful campaigns while minimizing risks in new market tests.

About us

 for U.S.-based companies operating in the home improvement industry.

Client Launching & New Niche Testing:
 
Launch new clients and test new niches in lead generation across Facebook, Google, and other ad networks.

Innovation Department

Stay ahead of industry trends, platform changes, and competitor strategies to maintain a competitive edge.

:

Native

Remote Work

 lead generation

Stay ahead of industry trends, platform changes, and competitor strategies to maintain a competitive edge.

description.description:
! Please note - we don't require Cover Letter, but we want to see you portfolio! Please add it to your applicaction (either by attaching it through "Attach Portfolio" field or by pasting a link in a "Personal website" field) !
Company Overview
CapsLock specializes in providing digital marketing services to businesses facing sales growth challenges. Our services include sales consulting, data analytics, and recruitment support, ensuring efficient and accelerated growth. Founded by industry professionals in IT, design, and data analytics, we address the market need for exclusive, scalable customer acquisition solutions.
At CapsLock, we value people, client orientation, quality, continuous improvement, integrity, and strong relationships. Our diverse, global team speaks over 10 languages, and their ideas drive the innovation that runs through everything we do - from unique technology to industry-leading services and customer experiences.
Role Overview
The CRO Video Editor plays a dual role - combining the operational precision of media processing with the creative expertise of full-cycle video production. You’ll be responsible for organizing and preparing raw photo and video materials, ensuring consistent quality and structure, while also developing complete, high-performing video creatives from concept to delivery.
This includes everything from converting and tagging footage to crafting data-driven, high-converting ads and funnel videos for platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and landing pages. You’ll collaborate closely with marketers, videographers, designers, and copywriters to turn insights and raw assets into engaging, conversion-focused content.
Key responsibilities
Media Processing & Organization
Process and organize incoming photo and video materials from client shoots.
Convert RAW files and ensure consistent visual quality and color profile application.
Upload, tag, and maintain all assets within the company’s Digital Asset Management (DAM) system.
Create and maintain internal guidelines for file organization, color LUTs, and upload standards.
Support the creative team by preparing source materials and ensuring accessible, structured media libraries.
Concept Development & Collaboration
Brainstorm and develop creative ad concepts with cross-functional teams (marketing, copywriting, videography).
Prepare shoot guides, reference materials, and creative briefs to align production with marketing goals.
Track and apply current video trends, platform features, and viral content strategies.
Communicate proactively on project progress, challenges, and improvements.
Video Production & Editing
Edit and enhance videos with strong rhythm, sound, color, typography, and effects to maximize viewer engagement.
Deliver polished, conversion-optimized videos tailored for YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, and landing pages.
Develop narrative structures and storylines that align with each platform’s audience and funnel stage.
Perform color correction, trimming, cropping, and basic sound adjustments; integrate graphics, music, and effects.
Implement AI tools to improve workflow efficiency and editing quality.
CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization) & Performance Analysis
Implement new creative ideas and concepts to improve video performance and engagement.
Collaborate with marketers and analysts to review performance data and adjust creative strategies.
Participate in A/B testing, analyze funnel and page metrics, and apply learnings to future edits.
Experiment with creative formats, transitions, and storytelling approaches to increase ad effectiveness.
description.requirements:
3+ year of experience in video editing or post-production.
Strong portfolio demonstrating media processing and video editing expertise.
Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere Pro, Lightroom, Photoshop, After Effects).
Experience of working with video rhythm, sound, transitions, color correction, typography, and effects to maximize viewer engagement.
Hands-on experience with video formats tailored for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook.
Solid understanding of viral video trends, formats, and platform-specific features, with the ability to implement them effectively.
Upper-intermediate (B2) English or higher for communication and documentation.
Ability to test and iterate based on performance data.
Experience using AI tools in the video production workflow.
Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and adherence to deadlines.
Curiosity to explore new tools, trends, and creative techniques.
Adaptability to changing priorities and fast-paced production cycles.
Strong execution speed with a focus on quality.
Ownership, initiative, and drive to exceed expectations
Strong attention to detail, especially when adhering to compliance and brand guidelines.
Clear, professional communication and collaboration.
What we offer
Not only do we offer fair and competitive pay, but we also provide perks and benefits that support your well-being and growth. Here are some of them:
Remote Work - 
we are a truly remote-first company. You choose where you feel the most productive and comfortable to make an impact.
Paid Time Off - 
work-life balance matters to us, and we support it with paid time off for rest, personal time, or simply doing what makes you happy.
Ongoing Learning - 
we believe in curiosity and growth. That’s why we support continuous learning with workshops, online courses, conferences, and certifications.
Home Office - 
we help you set up your perfect workspace by covering equipment and furniture expenses, so you can do your best work from home.
Physical Well-Being - 
from gym memberships and yoga classes to home workout equipment or even a bicycle, we give you the flexibility to stay active your way.
Unlimited Sick Days - 
your health matters. Take the time you need to rest and recover - we’ll be here when you’re ready to return.
Medical Coverage - 
we support you and your family with reimbursement for medical insurance and health-related expenses, including dental care and psychological support.
Co-Working Space - 
if you sometimes crave a change of scenery or more social interaction, we’ll cover the full cost of a co-working space.
Fun Stuff - 
from gaming nights and fitness challenges to annual retreats at world-class resorts, we make sure there’s never a shortage of fun and connection.
